translation.en: Let's do it. Chrissy! It's time for your…
Get back here, you little hubcap! It's…
[Mama] All right, you've got nowhere to go!
Let's all just go home and take a nice, warm bath.
translation.it: Torniamo a casa dove ci aspetta un bel bagnetto caldo.

translation.en: Stay on her tail. I'll cut her off at the pass!
translation.it: Tu seguila, io le taglio la strada.

translation.en: Huh? Why aren't you in school?
I got ya! I got ya! I…
You fall for that every time.
Another peaceful day in Bumperton Hills.
translation.it: Un'altra giornata tranquilla a Bumperton Hills.

translation.en: Tub's almost full. All right, Chrissy.
translation.it: - La vasca è quasi piena. - Ok, Chrissy.

translation.en: Come on. It's your turn to take a bath.
translation.it: Dai, tocca a te fare il bagnetto.
Che c'è? Amo fare il bagno.

translation.en: Maybe you could teach Chrissy to love baths too. What do you think?
translation.it: Allora convinci anche Chrissy. Che ne dici, Chrissy?
Una scatola? No, è una casa. Entra.

translation.en: Now, Chrissy with the weather. Up next, tornado!
translation.it: E ora le previsioni di Chrissy. Tra poco, un tornado!
Non è un buco. È uno specchio!

translation.en: Pirate ship! Ahoy, matey. Arr, matey!
translation.it: - Una nave di pirati! Ehi, ciurma! - Ehi, ciurma!

translation.en: Choppy water, choppy water, choppy water.
[gasps] I know! Close your eyes and pretend real hard.
translation.it: Idea! Chiudi gli occhi e immagina forte!

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy. You look so cute bouncing on that trampoline.
translation.it: Ciao, Chrissy. Salti benissimo su quel trampolino.

translation.en: Of course. Chrissy. You are just the cutest thing ever!
What you doin'? Blowin' dandelions? Makin' wishes?
translation.it: Che fai, giochi coi soffioni? Esprimi qualche desiderio?

translation.en: You are just the cutest thing ever!
-[Bobby blowing] -Keep trying, little guy. You can do it.
Looks like someone needs some holdin'.
Oh, you're giving me money? Thank you?
translation.it: E tu mi dai del denaro? Grazie…

translation.en: Oh, I-- I don't know that song.
Uh, this is all so very cute.
[Carley] That is the cutest thing ever!
Well, you see, my dad was gonna throw it out, but I saved it.
translation.it: Beh, mio padre voleva buttarlo, ma io l'ho salvato perché mi ricorda te.

translation.en: Because it reminded me of you.
translation.it: ma io l'ho salvato perché mi ricorda te.

translation.en: Wanna go help me add it to my gallery space?
translation.it: Vieni ad aggiungerlo alla mia galleria?

translation.en: Snacky snack! Here you go, Chrissy. I got you a special treat.
translation.it: - Stuzzichino! - Tieni, Chrissy. Ho una sorpresina.

translation.en: Nice try, but raisins are good for you,
and makes Mommy feel better about that milkshake I gave you yesterday.
translation.it: così non mi sento in colpa per il frappè di ieri.

translation.en: Chasing a cookie in a jar, I see.
translation.it: Insegui un biscotto in un barattolo.

translation.en: I remember the first time I chased a sugary snack.
translation.it: Ricordo la mia prima caccia a un dolcetto.

translation.en: Fastest crumb cake I ever-- Don't mean to be rude, but I'm going left. Bye!
translation.it: Una torta velocissima… Scusa, io giro a sinistra. Ciao!

translation.en: Bye, Mr. Coaltrain! Hope you catch your cookie!
translation.it: - Ciao, sig. Carbontreno! - Cattura quel biscotto!

translation.en: Hey, kids. Who wants a healthy snack?
translation.it: Ehi, bimbi. Chi vuole uno spuntino sano?

translation.en: I-- I don't have any cookies!
Please don't eat me! I'm not as sweet as I look!
translation.it: Non mangiarmi! Non sono dolce come sembro!

translation.en: You ate all your raisins! Good job, Chrissy.
translation.it: Hai mangiato tutta l'uvetta. Brava, Chrissy!

translation.en: I think you deserve a cookie.
♪ Baby Unicar! Colors so bright! Travels the uni-- ♪
translation.it: Baby Unicar, che colori intensi! Gira per…

translation.en: Now, you know we don't draw on the wall…
translation.it: Sai che non si disegna sui muri…

translation.en: [blubbers] No. No drawing on the wall.
That is not what I meant! Chrissy, I'm warning you.
translation.it: Non ho detto questo! Chrissy, ti avverto.

translation.en: Okay, you need to stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.it: Ok, Chrissy, starai in punizione sul divano.

translation.en: I'm setting this timer for five minutes.
You can get up when the face goes from sad to happy.
I'll be just in the other room.
♪ Travels the universe Making wrongs right ♪
translation.it: Gira per l'universo, componendo i dissensi

translation.en: Stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.it: Resta sul divano come ho detto.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh no! No TV during time outs.
translation.it: - Oh, no! - Niente TV in punizione.

translation.en: Well, at least it comes off easy.

translation.it: Non ho un baule così grande.

translation.en: I was just fixing it. -No, you see, Chrissy, I was just-- -That's it! Time out!
translation.it: - Lo stavo ritoccando. No, volevo solo… - Basta, sei in punizione!

translation.en: Don't leave couch until sad to happy.
translation.it: Resterai sul divano fino alla faccia felice.

translation.en: Uh, Chrissy, you set it for an hour.
-[Mama] Where to next, everybody? -Last one to the ball pit's a rusty car!
translation.it: Dove stiamo andando? L'ultimo che arriva è un'auto arrugginita!

translation.en: Are you two eyeing that big Baby Unicar toy?
translation.it: Volete il pupazzo di Baby Unicar?

translation.en: One hundred tickets is a lot, but it's worth it 'cause it's our last one.
translation.it: Cento biglietti sono tanti, ma li vale perché è l'ultimo.
Avviso dalla sala giochi di Mike:

translation.en: Last chance to bring your tickets in to exchange them for a prize!
translation.it: ultima occasione per convertire i biglietti in premio!
Mai mangiata una banana così buona!

translation.en: Enjoy your banana, Chrissy! Oh no!
translation.it: - Goditi la banana, Chrissy! - Oh, no!

translation.en: Hey, you two. What prizes can I get you today?
translation.it: Ehi, quali premi volete ritirare oggi?

translation.en: Whoa! Okay. I'm gonna go count these up.
Sorry, guys. You both only have 50 tickets each. Pencils are all you can get.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, avete 50 biglietti a testa. Posso darvi solo le matite.

translation.en: Maybe if you put your tickets together, you could share the Baby Unicar toy?
translation.it: Ma se metteste insieme i biglietti, potreste condividere il pupazzo.

translation.en: Chrissy best hide and seeker. -She is pretty good. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: - Sono la migliore a nascondino. - Sì, è brava.

translation.en: Well, we'll see who's the best.
Now it's my turn to seek and I'm gonna find you all in no time.
translation.it: Ora tocca a me cercare e vi troverò subito.

translation.en: Chrissy, if I can't find you, you can have cookies for dinner.
translation.it: Chrissy, se non ti trovo, per cena avrai i biscotti!

translation.en: Ready or not, here I come!
translation.it: Chi è pronto è pronto, io guardo!

translation.en: Come out, come out, wherever you are!
-I thought you'd never find me here. -[Papa chuckles]
translation.it: Come hai fatto a trovarmi qui?

translation.en: -If we split up, we can cover more ground. -Good idea.
translation.it: - Dividiamoci, sarà più facile. - Buona idea.

translation.en: Nothing downstairs. All right. Let's keep looking.
translation.it: - Di sotto non ci sono. - Ok, continuiamo.

translation.en: -[Cory] It came from the closet! -Chrissy, they're coming!
[scoffs] Looks like they found us, Chrissy.
Looks like Chrissy's better than you thought.
translation.it: Chrissy è più brava del previsto.

translation.en: What? She just got lucky! We'll find her.
translation.it: Cosa? È solo stata fortunata! La troveremo.

translation.en: -What? -Freddie, why are you in my house?
translation.it: - Freddie, che ci fai qui? - Gioco a nascondino con Kimmy e Timmy.

translation.en: I'm playing hide and seek with Kimmy and Timmy. They'll never find me here.
translation.it: - Freddie, che ci fai qui? - Gioco a nascondino con Kimmy e Timmy. Non cercheranno mai qui.

translation.en: -What should we do? -I don't know where else to look.
translation.it: - E ora? - Non so più dove cercare.

translation.en: Okay, you win! Chrissy, you're the best at hide and seek!
translation.it: Ok, hai vinto! Sei la migliore a nascondino!

translation.en: Whoa, you keep jumping like that and there won't be any water left!
translation.it: Se continui a tuffarti così, l'acqua finirà!

translation.en: Time to head home, Chrissy. Say goodbye to Catalina.
Okay, just one more. I'm gonna say goodbye to Cat's mom.
translation.it: Ok, solo un altro. Intanto saluto la mamma di Cat.
Niente ruote, niente tuffo a bomba.

translation.en: Those kids just love being in the water.
translation.it: I bimbi adorano stare in acqua.

translation.en: -Nice circle! -How are we gonna make this triangle?
translation.it: - Bel cerchio! - Come facciamo il triangolo?
- Non riesco a fermarmi. - Oh, no!
- Tuffo a bomba! - Tuffo a bomba!

translation.en: Can we please have crumpets for dinner?
-All right, see you next week. -See you then.
[Papa] Hmm, now it just needs a really funny joke.
translation.it: Ora serve solo una bella battuta.

translation.en: Let's see what's on the internet.
[Papa] ♪ A great idea will come to me ♪
Ooh, someone commented on my new profile pic!
translation.it: Un commento alla mia nuova foto profilo!

translation.en: I should probably take a power nap before lunch.
translation.it: Mi serve un pisolino prima di pranzo.

translation.en: Get off my bumper, Bobby. Are we doing it or not?
translation.it: Non starmi col fiato sul paraurti, Bobby. Suoniamo o no?

translation.en: [Mama] …additional concrete to support the new structure. Oh, hold on, Julia, I need to take this call.
translation.it: Serve altro cemento per la struttura. Aspetta, Julia. Devo rispondere.

translation.en: Hi, hon, it's me, Papa. Have you seen my snuggle socks?
translation.it: Ciao, cara. Sono papà. Hai visto i miei calzini?

translation.en: Top drawer. Wait, are you about to take a nap?
translation.it: Nel primo cassetto. Stai andando a riposare?

translation.en: I'm back. Let's open the blueprints and take a look at the foundation.
translation.it: Rieccomi, Julia. Esaminiamo le fondamenta nel progetto.

translation.en: One and a two and a three, four, five.
Nap time is over! Time to roll!
translation.it: - Il pisolino è finito! - Dobbiamo tornare!

translation.en: [grunts] You're getting so big. Don't you grow up too fast, okay?
translation.it: Stai diventando proprio grande. Non crescere troppo in fretta, ok?

translation.en: -Wait. Did you just wink at yourself? -Yep.
I just need to draw a perfectly straight line. Yes. Almost there.
translation.it: Devo solo tracciare una linea dritta. Sì, ci sono quasi.

translation.en: Ah! Oh, Chrissy. You scared me.
Do you have a case of the hiccups?
I have just the thing. Drink some water.
translation.it: Ho pronto il rimedio. Bevi l'acqua.

translation.en: Oh, I know. Let's try this.
Now take a drink of water.
I'm just helping Chrissy cure her hiccups.
translation.it: Faccio passare il singhiozzo a Chrissy.

translation.en: Oh. Well, I have an idea.
My mom always gave me a spoonful of sugar to cure my hiccups.
translation.it: Mia madre mi dava un cucchiaio di zucchero.

translation.en: I don't know if that'll work.

translation.it: Forse non mi dava lo zucchero. Era il sale? La senape?
Forse non mi dava lo zucchero. Era il sale? La senape? L'aceto no. La salamoia non funziona.
L'aceto no. La salamoia non funziona.
- Proviamo con il pepe. - Oh, no.

translation.en: Did the fridge break again? No, we're just trying to get rid of Chrissy's hiccups.
translation.it: - Si è di nuovo rotto frigo? - No, è per il singhiozzo di Chrissy.

translation.en: Oh, my mom has a neat trick for that. You just have to hold your breath for ten seconds.
translation.it: Mia madre usa un trucco: trattenere il respiro per dieci secondi.

translation.en: -[hiccups] -Oh, Chrissy! Do you have the hiccups?
A good laugh always gets rid of them for me.
translation.it: A me scompare sempre con una bella risata.

translation.en: What do you call a sick train? A-choo-choo train!
translation.it: Sai come si chiama un treno malato? Etciù-ciuf-ciuf.

translation.en: The best way to get rid of hiccups is by scaring them away.
translation.it: Per mandare via il singhiozzo bisogna spaventarlo.

translation.en: When I get the hiccups, I fly corkscrews through the air. That always helps.
translation.it: Quando io ho il singhiozzo, fare acrobazie in aria mi aiuta.

translation.en: You'll just have to bounce them out.
-My mom gave me a spoonful of sugar-- -Yeah, we tried that.
translation.it: - Mia madre mi dava lo zucchero… - Già provato.

translation.en: This mask will definitely scare those hiccups out of Chrissy.
translation.it: Questa maschera spaventerà il singhiozzo di Chrissy.

translation.en: I knew laughter would do the trick.
Look at me! Look at me!
Hot chocolate. Get your hot chocolate here!
What a nice day to go sledding.
translation.it: Che bella giornata per andare sulla slitta!

translation.en: Whoa, slow down, Chrissy. Wait for me. Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Uh, Chrissy, people say the best part of sledding is actually the view.
translation.it: Sai, Chrissy, in slitta ci si gode la vista.

translation.en: Why don't we just stay up here and get some hot chocolate?
translation.it: Se restassimo qui a bere cioccolata calda?

translation.en: Chrissy! Wait, wait, wait. No! No! No! No!
[Papa chuckles] You know what? The best part of sledding really is the view.
translation.it: Sai, in slitta ci si gode davvero la vista.

translation.en: Huh? Sorry, Chrissy, I can't. I have a lot of work to do.
translation.it: Non posso, Chrissy. Ho tanto lavoro.

translation.en: Oh, maybe you could go play with Mama and Cory?
translation.it: Perché non vai a giocare con la mamma e Cory?
- Giochiamo! - Chrissy! Stiamo già facendo un gioco.

translation.en: -We're actually in the middle of a game. -Yeah, ages five and up.
translation.it: - Giochiamo! - Chrissy! Stiamo già facendo un gioco. Sì, dai cinque anni in su.

translation.en: -Maybe you can play with Papa? -Papa no play time.
translation.it: - Perché non giochi con papà? - Papà non può.
È magico! Controlla le persone, non solo la TV.

translation.en: It lets you control someone like you control the TV. Watch. Hey, Cory!
translation.it: È magico! Controlla le persone, non solo la TV. Guarda. Ehi, Cory!

translation.en: Oh, hey, is that super remote?
But the rule is that you have to play along no matter what. Play!
translation.it: ma la regola è che bisogna stare al gioco. Play!

translation.en: I remember the fun we used to…
Hey! Who put this banana in my card pile?
translation.it: Ehi, chi ha messo una banana nel mio mazzo?

translation.en: Nice job distracting her. You never do stuff like that to me, do you?
translation.it: Bella distrazione! Con me non l'hai mai fatto, vero?

translation.en: -Play. -…super remote? Just don't use it on me, okay?
translation.it: - Play. - Telecomando magico? Non usarlo su di me.

translation.en: Huh? Where did my pencil go?
Very funny, but I need to get back to work.
This comic is gonna take forever to finish.
translation.it: Ci metterò una vita per finire questo fumetto.

translation.en: Done. Bye, Mr. Pencil! I'm hungry. Time for a snack! See you later, Chrissy!
translation.it: Fatto. Ciao, matita! Mi serve uno spuntino! A dopo!

translation.en: Hi, whatcha doing? Making nachos? None for me. Ketchup. Corn. Pan. No.
translation.it: Che fai, cara? I nachos? Per me no. Ketchup. Mais. Padella. No.

translation.en: -Nothing like a cold glass of juice! -Pause.
translation.it: - Un succo fresco è perfetto! - Pausa.

translation.en: -You two look like you're having fun. -Mama, play time!
translation.it: Vedo che vi state divertendo. - Mamma, giochiamo! - No, devo finire il gioco.

translation.en: I can't. I gotta get back to my game.
translation.it: - Mamma, giochiamo! - No, devo finire il gioco.

translation.en: Looks like I'm in control now.
-Play. Pause. Play. Pause. Play. -Mama, what are you doing?
translation.it: - Play. Pausa. Play. Pausa. Play. - Mamma, che fai?

translation.en: We're still playing! Papa, do something!
translation.it: Stiamo ancora giocando! Papà, fa' qualcosa!

translation.en: [Cory] Come on, Chrissy. You've had your fun.
Time to get back to work.
Well, I guess no more super remote. And no more play time.
translation.it: - Niente più telecomando magico. - E niente più giochi.

translation.en: Look, everyone! It's the saltshaker of madness!
translation.it: Guardate! È la saliera della follia!

translation.en: If you get hit by the magic salt,
translation.it: Se il sale magico ti tocca,

translation.en: Okay, so I think we have all the resources we need.
translation.it: Ok, abbiamo tutte le risorse necessarie.

translation.en: I've got some work to do though. Do you think you can take care of it?
translation.it: Ma ora devo lavorare. Potresti pensarci tu?

translation.en: All right, I'm back. Let's raid this dungeon!
Presenting… The Gary Garbage Truck Perfume.
translation.it: Ecco "Il profumo del camion della spazzatura di Gary".

translation.en: Guaranteed to make you smell like the greatest garbage truck in the world.
translation.it: Fa puzzare come il camion di spazzatura più fetido del mondo.

translation.en: I wouldn't go in there if I were you.
translation.it: Io non ci entrerei se fossi in te.

translation.en: I don't know who used the bathroom last, but might just be best to, you know, let it air out.
translation.it: Non so chi sia stato in bagno per ultimo, ma io lo farei arieggiare un po'.

translation.en: Yeah! We need to use the bathroom!
Hey, Chrissy. I see you found the smell.
translation.it: Ehi, Chrissy. Hai capito da chi veniva la puzza.

translation.en: I knew you could do it.
Wait. What the… Where's the toilet?
-[dance music] -Welcome to the Lucky Lounge. Here you go, boys.
translation.it: - Benvenuta nella Lucky Lounge. - Ecco a voi.

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Fenderson. Enjoy yourself this evening.
You need more than that if you wanna party with the high rollers.
translation.it: Te ne servono tanti per stare coi pezzi grossi.

translation.en: [game] Sorry! Too bad! Sorry! Almost! Too bad!
translation.it: Scusa. Peccato! Scusa. Ci sei quasi. Peccato!

translation.en: Crispy! Combo! Awesome! Crispy! Combo! Perfect score!
translation.it: Ottimo! Mix! Fantastico. Ottimo! Mix! Punteggio perfetto.

translation.en: Chrissy lucky? You got a lucky penny. Better hang onto it.
translation.it: - Chrissy è fortunata? - È la monetina. Non perderla!

translation.en: Good luck fishing today, Squint. Ha! Luck's got nothing to do with it.
translation.it: - Buona fortuna con la pesca, Squint! - Non mi serve fortuna.

translation.en: I finally got the white whale!
translation.it: Finalmente ho preso la balena bianca!
Non è la monetina. Sono io fortunata!

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the 65th annual Bumper-Ball Championship!
translation.it: Benvenuti al 65° torneo annuale di calcioruote!

translation.en: But first, a quick word from our sponsor.
I'm gonna go upstairs and do some work.
-You're gonna take a nap, aren't you? -What? No!
translation.it: - O vai a fare un pisolino? - Cosa? No!

translation.en: Morning, Chrissy. We're babysitting one of your friends today.
translation.it: 'Giorno, Chrissy. Oggi starai con un amico.

translation.en: I left a snack for you two on the table!
translation.it: Vi ho lasciato uno spuntino sul tavolo!

translation.en: We've got the match of the century here today, folks!
translation.it: Oggi è la partita del secolo!

translation.en: It's the long-awaited showdown between two fated rivals.
translation.it: L'atteso scontro tra due storici rivali.

translation.en: The Mean Green Machines versus the Tin Can Vans!
translation.it: Le Spietate Macchinine Verdi contro i Furgoncini di Latta.

translation.en: Who will take the win? Who will come out on top?
translation.it: Chi vincerà? Chi dominerà la classifica?

translation.en: The Tin Can Vans have snatched the ball from the offense.
translation.it: I Furgoncini di Latta prendono la palla.

translation.en: They are headed downfield. Look at that fancy wheel work.
translation.it: Avanzano sul campo. Che gioco di ruote!

translation.en: And goal! It's a goal for the Tin Can Vans!
translation.it: Ed è goal per i Furgoncini di Latta!

translation.en: The Mean Greens are left in shock.
But they don't leave them a second to celebrate.
Both teams are scrambling. I can barely see the ball, folks!
translation.it: C'è agitazione. Non vedo la palla.

translation.en: It's been found. The Mean Greens have the ball. We're off to the races! What a beautiful maneuver.
translation.it: Rieccola! Palla per le Macchinine. La gara è serrata. Che passaggio!

translation.en: Go, Mean Greens! Show 'em who's boss!

translation.it: Questa macchinina ha le ruote fatate!

translation.en: Ah-ha! And it's a goal for Green! The Vans manage to break away! It looks like a clean--
translation.it: Goal per le Macchinine! Ma i Furgoncini si smarcano. Sembra un…

translation.en: Wait a minute. What just happened?
A fan has come onto the field. He's stolen the ball!
translation.it: C'è un tifoso in campo e ha rubato la palla!

translation.en: Can no one get their tires on the slippery suspect?
translation.it: Nessuno gli mette le ruote addosso?

translation.en: Oh, they got him. The fan is down! They're really giving him a walloping!
translation.it: Preso! Tifoso a terra! Gli stanno dando una lezione.

translation.en: The match is heating up. There's no sign of it slowing down.
translation.it: La gara si scalda. Nessuno rallenta.

translation.en: And those victory dances are nothing to sneeze at.
translation.it: E questa esultanza non va derisa.

translation.en: The walls are closing in. There's nowhere left to turn.
translation.it: Sono spalle al muro, senza scampo.

translation.en: But wait! A teammate is wide open. Waiting in the wings like an angel.
translation.it: Ma c'è un giocatore libero sulle ali, come un angelo.

translation.en: A beautiful pass. And beautifully received.
It's all come down to this. One final goal will decide the match.
translation.it: È la resa dei conti: il goal finale sarà decisivo.

translation.en: With seconds on the clock, who will take the championship title?
translation.it: Mancano pochi secondi: chi vincerà il torneo?

translation.en: It's another mad scramble. The play goes haywire.
translation.it: Un'altra corsa folle. È un delirio!

translation.en: Cars are sent head over wheels.
The ball is in the air. It's anyone's game.
translation.it: Palla in aria. Tutto può succedere.

translation.en: It's all over, folks! It's a tie!
Oh, look at you two having so much fun together.
translation.it: Oh, vi state divertendo un mondo insieme!

translation.en: Oh, there's only one left. I'll go get some cups so we can split it.
translation.it: Ce n'è solo uno. Prendo i bicchieri per dividerlo.

translation.en: We wouldn't leave you hanging, folks! The match moves into overtime.
translation.it: L'attesa è finita. Si va ai supplementari.

translation.en: Okay. This goes in here. And this…
translation.it: Ok, questo va qui e questo…
- Ora tocca a te. - Scusa, Chrissy.

translation.en: Hop on out of that box, please.
We used to make home movies of you and Cory with this all the time.
translation.it: La usavamo sempre per registrare video di te e Cory.

translation.en: [Papa] Here we go! Hi, Chrissy. Say hi to the camera!
translation.it: Ecco qua! Ciao, Chrissy. Di' ciao!

translation.en: Okay, that was fun. Now I need to get back to--
translation.it: Ok, divertente. Ora devo tornare a…

translation.en: I just have so much to do.
translation.it: Devo fare un sacco di cose.

translation.en: [Papa] Yeah. There's Cory, walking down the hill. Hi, Cory! Where's Chrissy?
translation.it: Sì, Cory sta scendendo sulla collina. Ehi, Cory! Dov'è Chrissy?

translation.en: Now, when you're hunting a ghost, you have to be very quiet.
translation.it: Quando si cerca un fantasma, bisogna fare molto silenzio.

translation.en: [Mama] Oh, Chrissy's first restaurant! And what would Madame like to order?
translation.it: - La prima volta di Chrissy al ristorante! - Cosa desidera ordinare?

translation.en: [Mama] What do puppy cars say? Bark, bark, bark!
translation.it: - Come fanno le macchinine cagnolino? - Bau!

translation.en: [Mama laughs] That's right! And what do puppy cars do?
translation.it: Brava! E cosa fanno le macchinine cagnolino?

translation.en: Now I wonder, who could have made all of this mess?
translation.it: Mi chiedo chi mai avrà combinato questo disastro.

translation.en: That's still our Chrissy. Well, I think that was all of them.
translation.it: E lo sei ancora. Beh, i video sono finiti.

translation.en: Aw, you excited for Mama and Papa to get home, Cory?
translation.it: Sei felice che mamma e papà tornino a casa, Cory?

translation.en: Cory, let them through the door! Here, let me grab your bags, dear.
translation.it: Cory, falli entrare! Lascia che ti prenda le borse, caro.

translation.en: Oh, thanks, Mom. [Cory] I wanna see! Let me see!
Cory, meet your new baby sister, Chrissy.
translation.it: Cory, ecco la tua sorellina, Chrissy.

translation.en: I'm gonna show her my toys!
[Papa's mom] These really are special times.
And they go by so fast.
Mama go back to work now?
How about I hide and you seek?
translation.it: Ti va se io mi nascondo e tu mi cerchi?
